website_summaries.verdict: Lights in this set work well and are great for boat trailers, because they are rated waterproof.
pros: Very bright tail lights for your trailer
Compact and well-sealed in order to be waterproof
Lights provide a nice upgrade to an older system for your trailer
Holds up really well in water
cons: Kit only contains short amount of wire and must be installed on an existing trailer lighting system

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for the price but no wiring diagram
customer_reviews.text: Hope this helps headaches for others: White= ground Grey = running lights (one with the brown stripe) Red = solid color (yellow on drivers side/ green on passenger side)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: * Update * These are great so far.
customer_reviews.text: * Update - Failed after 1 season. No damage to housing but half of the LED's on 1 light failed. Submerged about 12 times before LED's started going out. * I've only had them submerged at the ramp about 5 times since installing but so far so good. My main concern switching to LED's was if the brightness from the standard running mode to brake/turn would be significant. I've seen some cars with LED tails and the parking lights are either really dim or the brakes/turns are barely brighter than the running lights. These are about perfect to me. Similar change in brightness that you would see from an incandescent. I'll post a video to show them in action.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The studs need to about a quarter inch longer to more easily attach the light with a license plate bracket and ...
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well made although I have not road tested them yet. The design made them more difficult for me to attach to my trailer. The studs need to about a quarter inch longer to more easily attach the light with a license plate bracket and get the washers and nuts on. Also, since the wires come directly out of the back instead of the side, I had to drill holes in the trailer to feed the wires through so they didn't pinch. A lot more work than should be necessary. And, of course the ground wire must be attached to a stud ideally with a ring terminal.
customer_reviews.author: Upperquay

customer_reviews.title: Great lights very bright to hook them up to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lights very bright to hook them up to a 4 flat trailer wiring green yellow brown and white in front of trailer for ground. White wire on lights ground to bolt on light grey wire goes to brown on both sides.The red wire goes to green or yellow green for right passengers side and yellow for left side drivers side hood luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Works after replacement
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights came defective where on one side the flashers didn't work. I e-mailed the seller and they needed photo proof that it was damaged - how are you supposed to photograph a light that doesn't work? I hooked up the light and my volt meter to a battery showing there was 12V and no light. After sending this to the seller they sent out a new light kit but shipped it ground which took a week when the original parts came faster. It would have been easier to return the original set as defective and order a new set.
customer_reviews.author: K Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Hardware not included as stated on flyer inside
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed the little flyer inside said that the bag of hardware contained 2 ground screws the terminals 4 gray wire nuts 6 wire clips and 3 snap lock connectors. Basically everything needed to do the job, but when i checked all it came with were the 4 bolts nedded to mount which would mean i need to go and get everything else i need to install. Kind of problem when i ready to get this thing going. Lights havent even laster 4 months and one od them is already failing. Tried to contact amazon said they couldnt do anything about it. Was told to contact seller. Will try that next.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box not working!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had listened to the reviews and realized that you get what you pay for. The wires for both lights are the exact same colors which do not match the wires on a trailer. One of the lights didn't work at all straight out of the box. The bolts are too short on the one side that you'd put the tag holder on. I was forced to do away with the washers in order to make it attach. Save your money and spend a little more on something better made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works... for 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 6 months. Left (license plate) light main LED array failed after 6 months. Was never submerged. Only exposed to ordinary rain. About a month before it failed, I noticed it dimmer than the right hand side light. Figured it was some wiring issue of mine, although I've gone over the whole harness before installing these, and didn't have harness-related issues before. Recently, noticed that although the license plate light (downlight) and side-marker were going strong, the face had gone completely out. Cheap chinesium manufacturing without proper supervision causes this.
customer_reviews.author: charity services

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights, installation problem
customer_reviews.text: These are nice lights, but one thing you need to know about the installation. The wires come out of the back dead center between the mounting bolts. This means you need to drill a 3/8 to 1/2 hole between the mounting holes on your trailer bracket to insure a flush mount and no pinching of the wires. I drilled a 3/8 hole and found that the sealant around the wires did not fit through the hole so I put two fender washers on each bolt to insure a tight mount without damaging the wires. They look great and look forward to lighting them up. Suggestion to manufacturer: Change the location of the wires to minimize problems in mounting
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These were very easy to fit, the only slight problem I had was the wires came from the center of the fitting and I have only the Two fixing holes on my steel trailer. Normally with the older incandescent lights I dropped the lens off and drilled a hole in the base to thread the wires through, these have fixed lenses so simple fix I used spacers to give the wires room to drop. Apart from that simple ! The lights are bright and very visible from a distance even in bright sunlight. Very happy with my purchase, recommend this product to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Includes Wiring Diagram / Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Others are claiming there are no instructions but my box included them, see photos. Wire colors are standard trailer 4-wire -White is Gnd -Brown is Driving Lights and left side down light for license plate -Yellow is brake / left turn signal -Green is brake / right turn signal I've included photos of the included install diagram sheet and the install. Are very bright and work great. Are installed on a light duty utility trailer so won't comment on their under water performance.
customer_reviews.author: CJV

customer_reviews.title: You may have to use a terminal ring to make a good ground for these lights to work good!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of replacement lights . I replaced an old set of troublesome standard bulb lights on my utility trailer .. The old lights used the mounting studs for the ground so on these I just put a terminal ring on the white wire on both sides and used a wavy washer to bite in and give these lights a good ground. They are very bright and the reflectors are awesome too. These lights have built in side markers that my old set didn't have. I don't use this trailer as a submarine like my boat trailer but I like that they are waterproof anyhow.. One less thing to go wrong ? Right? lol
customer_reviews.author: Boomerman44

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.text: The light stopped working after one use. Took my jetski to the lake and the trailer was submerged at the launch dock and the lights stopped working after one use. It is not waterproof. Ive Checked all the connections and the everything has continuity. The led stopped working
customer_reviews.author: von888

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 2 trips (less than 5 miles each)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these may of 2019, Set in my garage until three weeks ago, got them installed, all new wiring, with water proof and heat shrink connections, unhook lights before backing into the lake to load and unload. The stop light/turn signal no longer works on the drivers side. Can not seem to find a replacement LED, looks like will have to buy a complete set. or install a light with bulb. The lights really looked great, and were very bright, for the short time they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12 volt bright easy installation
customer_reviews.text: was easy to add to my trailer that had 12 volt bulb style. one note these mount tight to frame and some trailer frames have a hole for wire to come through straight out the back, my trailer frame dd not have a hole in it so wire from these lights would be a squeeze against the trailer frame so I just added a spacer to the light mount studs so not to squeezes wires tight behind the light but not a necessary thing to do. These use less energy, brighter and no bulbs to change. A tip, I use hot glue gun to seal my connectors as well.
customer_reviews.author: helena

customer_reviews.title: Not for boat trailers
customer_reviews.text: Had the lights just over a year on my boat trailer and most of the LEDs (or the wires to the LEDs) have stopped working. The lights would fill with water when loading and unloading the boat and would not drain fully. Took the boat out about a dozen times during the year, about half the time in salt water. The lights are not very expensive, but changing the lights is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer lights for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well made, they're bright, the wiring is tinned copper and color coded. The only issue I see with them is the wiring is routed out of the back of the light housing, so if you have a solid bracket, you'll have to drill a hole for the wiring to come through. On most of the higher end lights the wiring comes out of the side or has tracks in the housing for the wires to fit so they can be flush mounted. I have no idea why people had issues wiring these up, you can easily achieve a ground with an eyelet and use the stud.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with these taillights so far. I’m pretty skeptical because of the price. I have them hooked up to utilize the tag light, still very sufficient brightness and unbelievably bright when the breaks or turn signals are used. I haven’t submerged them, but I don’t really plan to. Just hope that they last, they are already better than the cheesy cheep regular bulbed ones that came on the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: FEATHERS44

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Totally NOT waterproof! On the way home from a 500 mile fishing trip to Lake Michigan, once it got dark the fuse popped on my truck. Next day I looked and one of the taillights had an inch of water in it. The only way to drain it was drill a hole. 😠 When I installed them I even put silicone around the mounting bolts. Not happy! Update: the company has said they will send me a replacement taillight. Update to the update. They never did send a replacement taillight ( 7 weeks later) and they won't respond to emails. I do not recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Adam/Casey  Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Should have known by the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed. Dunked them one time. One has water in it. Lights have dimmed. It's not the connections. I checked for cracks or damage thinking it may have been damaged by a rock thrown by a tire. Nothing. They're just junk. Great way to get a "defective equipment" ticket from a trooper. Chinese junk. Only buy these lights if you want to get pulled over, or are never going to get them near water. A candle would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis R. Schoonmaker

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great LED lights for the price! very bright and they were easy to install. also note that these lights are FULLY led that means side marker is led along with light for license plate. this product is no cheap rip off led from your local store where just the taillight is led and rest are still filament bulbs. if you got a basic utility trailer that came with this model light but it uses the bulbs, buy these led taillight's!!! you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unit is as advertised and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my utility trailer that had poor lighting on it from the start These are absolutely great!! It was not too hard to figure out the wiring connections. The old trailer had slightly different wires but I guessed right and love the difference. Safety is now covered, by this installation, on the road. I was running with no tail lights or brake light or signal lights. I now have it all. Thanks for providing an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Good lights at a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Easy to install. The bolt holes lined right up with all the other standard lights this size. Only used 1 time to remove the jet ski from the marina and won’t use again until next season but after launching I didn’t see any water in the lights. Time will tell. We all know trailer lights are a huge pain so I’d be happy if they last 1 season especially given the cheap price. Also comes with instructions but if you have a factory wired trailer then just match up the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.  Wiring description is off
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a utility trailer. The wiring is very unclear since the product does not come with any instructions. Fairly easy to figure out. They come with three wires, White, Red, Gray. White = Ground, Red is a turn wire ( yellow=left, Green = right. Gray is running = brown of the original trailer wiring. About a six inch lead coming from the light. I found this to be just fine for my application. I would recommend these, only a four star because there still new, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Dude

customer_reviews.title: Critical Design Flaw!
customer_reviews.text: There's two studs that are permanently affixed to the light housing. Unfortunately, for me, those studs came loose from the inside of the housing such that you can't tighten the supplied nuts as the entire stud rotates. Effectively... You can't install the unit once this happens! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Very Bright.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was a bit tricky on my trailer because the wires come out the back of the lights. Instead of drilling through the thick metal I chose to add a couple nuts to each light as a spacer. Wiring was straightforward. (You will need a crimper) The lights are probably 10 times brighter than the original ones! They seem to be very well sealed and the LEDs should last a long time. No more bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: William Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Bright Bright Bright
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I used the wiring that was already there so it was basically plug and play for me. I replaced an LED light that I broke. This brand is noticeably brighter. If you're replacing traditional incandescent lights, you'll never regret switching to LED'S. They're basically maintenance free. Especially compared to the old style lights that never worked consistently. Overall, I'd buy these lights again.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and product! Fit perfectly and extremely bright. Come with rubber gaskets that work great as templates to drill center hold in trailer for wires to pass through. Simply put a wire connector on the white wires and bolt them under one of the mounting nuts for a excellent ground. Put jet skis in and they still worked under water and worked when i pulled the trailers in and out. Cant ask for more then that!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Sponsel

customer_reviews.title: As described, packaging for shipping needs to be better
customer_reviews.text: Missing 1 nut since it was shipped in the original box. Super bright, as you can tell from the video! Easy install, great replacement for the lights that came on my angle iron trailer.
customer_reviews.author: david859dr

customer_reviews.title: Best trailer lights!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a number of lights for my trailer, both bulb and led. These are waterproof and bright! I use them on my boat trailer, and they're honestly the brightest everywhere I go, and I've received compliments on the lights. Weird to get compliments on trailer lights,but I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT and of GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed for one, that all of the necessary hardware and instructions were included with the lights. Secondly, they look great. Lens looks good, looks like it would seal up nice. Thirdly, when I got them wired up and On, wowwwww. They were twice as bright as my last ones from another company. Highly recommend! Received in three days from ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: The instruction sheet states Bag of Hardware Contains: 6 wire nuts, 6 Wire Clips, and 6 snap lock connectors. Only came with 4 nuts. If I could give a "0" rating I would. Sad. Do not recommend buying this light set. Buy one that has pictures of the kit contents for a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I finally had time to install the lights. 1 of the trailer lights is defective. The light stays on steady burn, as if the breaks were on. I have replaced all of the wires on the trailer and the light is still on break light. The lights are great quality, minus this defect and would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sean H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: These worked good but there is a glob of what looks like sealant on the back where the wires come out. I had to drill a bigger hole in the back plate to mount then so they were flush. The nuts were metric too as they're made in China. Not the best but good for $17.99 with prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Matloff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for my old light set.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my old light set. Very bright and completely sealed. I have also replaced the wiring (purchased separately. If you need to replace the lights and the wiring, I highly recommend to set the trailer under a tree brunch to lift the front. This will make wiring replacement much easier than crawling under the dirty frame. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W.B.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: i've had boats a long time. several. These lights work as well as any I have ever had. Easy to install & just as bright if not brighter. i have paid much more for lights in the past.* NOTE...These do not have tha Harness with them. I did not need it but if you do you may want to order a different set
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Lights work with some concerns
customer_reviews.text: Everything works but the instructions are pretty sketchy. But, no wire nuts were included! Also, the wires should be a slightly thicker and stronger gauge, as stripping the wires for more exposure can cause several of the wire threads to come off as well. It would be helpful if a license plate brake was included for the left light assembly. Time will tell if these lights are truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: PH M.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: These installed fairly easily and are very bright. One design flaw is that the wiring comes out of the back of the unit directly between the 2 bolt/lugs which are used to secure it to the bracket. These wires then interfere with the unit resting flush on the bracket. I rigged up some spacers to make some room for the wiring. Otherwise, seems like a good product so far. The lights are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: voice_of_reason

customer_reviews.title: Studs not grounded and unable to wire in front of mounting plate.
customer_reviews.text: These are good lights if you want the wires to go through the mounting plates. However, in my case, wiring connection is in front of mounting plate on same side as light, so light wires would have to go back and forth through the mounting plate. Also, the light mounting studs are not grounded so you must separately ground each light to the frame. To do this right, you must buy and install crimp connections for each light ground wire. Overall, not as easy to install as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: THanow

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement lights.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of playing with my light every time I hooked up my trailer. One light would be out one would be dull. These lights are great ,bright and easy to install. maybe a half hour to install. They even fit the same studs as the old ones. You will be happy with this upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Diverges from standard wiring color code.
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world would the manufacturer diverge from standard color code! Had to stop the installation to cross the light's code (Red,White,Gray) to standard (Brown,White,Green). Seems to be well made and waterproof; otherwise. I may have more to say after installation. FYI: Light, White : White Light, Gray : Brown Light, Red : Yellow, drivers side---Green, passenger side
customer_reviews.author: Dominick DeFlorio

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality LED Trailer Lights
customer_reviews.text: Great quality LED lights at a great price. Bought 2 sets for trailers. Mount easy using a common bolt spacing for this type light. Brightness is very good. Left side light has a white LED facing down to light your registration plate.
customer_reviews.author: Pinot Noir

customer_reviews.title: Much brighter than the old bulbs
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I ever did a job like this. I had to completely rewire my boat trailer and after reading some reviews, I opted for these LED lights. Very bright... even in daylight. Installation was very straightforward. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jag

customer_reviews.title: Good light kit for boat trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my John boat trailer about 3 months ago. It was easy to wire up. The plug is well insulted and the wiring is thick and well made. I used zip ties to secure it to the frame in some places. The lights are bright easy to see in the daytime. Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bryan MC

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: There were ZERO instructions, but I got thru the wire color problem with online help. You will also need to drill a hole in the center of your mount point to feed the wires thru so they don't get smushed when you tighten the 10 mm METRIC nuts onto the somewhat short mounting bolts. Other than that, I like them.........but they haven't been into the water yet either. THAT will tell the tale
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Mayo DDS

customer_reviews.title: Well made/value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace some older lights on our Carson trailer. Holes lined right up and they function better than the ones we removed. I highly recommend these to those who want to upgrade to LED.
customer_reviews.author: Matt from SD

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sololy on the price thinking they will be cheap and that will be fine for what I needed them for! Well I was pleasantly surprised how well they were made. Nice and bright!! Made a great new addition to my trailer. Glad I didn’t spend more on LED’s that could do the same thing. I liked these so much I ordered a second pie for my dads trailer as well!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Seems OK
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell if these will hold up. Replaced some older bulb type lights on trailer. They seem to be made reasonable well. ZERO instructions or information on wiring - not good thus 4 stars. Being LED type you can damage if wired wrong - so who is in the pilot house on this deal?? If not for a well written review I would not have purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tenngeezer

customer_reviews.title: VERY BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: These would have been relatively easy to install had I not had to replace all the trailer wires. Go online to a few wiring sites and the wiring will make perfect sense. Very bright and they use little power.
customer_reviews.author: Wahoohead

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my previous trailer lights were not working too well. These were easy to install and worked with no issues. I dropped the boat in the water last weekend and afterwards the lights still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: They are trailer lights, requires a bit of reverse engineering due to inadequate instructions and Chinese wire colors but cheap enough to deal with it. As many times as my guys knock these off they're the only way to go. And even though they are led they work with a standard flasher.
customer_reviews.author: jesse james joslin

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great value. worked well. nice amd bright this had a 3 wire setup. i only had 2 wires to connect to from my trailer. one of the 3 wires off of the light has to be grounded to the frame. the other 2 connect to your leads coming from the trailer if you have a 2 wire set up as i did
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: patsam 12v trailor lights
customer_reviews.text: ordered on June 24th-june 26th 10 am delayed- 2 pm delayed NEVER ARRIVED.Called amazon July 5 th re ordered finely arrived July 5th. Lights are very bright, easy to connect, but license plate light does not work, Too much aggravation to return so I'll work with as they are , my tag has a light of its own, These lights were bought for brighter lighting on the rear of trailer. .great price, function well, I'm pleased with them. Only reason I did not give them a 5 is due to the tag light not working.
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT D JONES

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, makes good sense. Can cheaper and brighter than regular bulb lights.
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong for the price. I have no doubt I will buy more. Trailer lights in the mowing business don't last long anyway. Backing into ditches and such like. Definitely buy these again. Super bright and have survived a few bashes into the lockup walls so far.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: these lights are not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They filled with water, but did not fail. I drilled a small hole in them to allow them to drain. Lights are bright, work great, good price. They should drill a hole in them and not call them waterproof, still fine for launching boats, just be sure to disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Wiring code is not standard. Bolt holes and hole for wiring are not normal either.
customer_reviews.text: And, the directions are totally not for this light set. Colors are not American standard, don't know if they might be for another country? By the time you figure it out, and redrill holes, you have way more time invested than money. I hope they hold up, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Woody K

customer_reviews.title: Typical junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a year....I sealed all the edges with silicone and cyanoacrylate since I have found any light listed as submersible or waterproof is a total lie.....they still fried with a nice black spot on the lens. No water intrusion, still failed.
customer_reviews.author: Lickerupfront

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof! Fills with water.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 100% NOT waterproof. If your application is not near any water, great. I installed two sets of these and both had water in them after 1 trip to the boat ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Left tail light blinker does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The lights are very bright and very visible at night. I hooked up and connected both tail lights the running lights work perfectly. The only draw back is that the left side blinker does not work at all. I connected all wires correctly and still do not have signal for the left hand side. Is there any way to return just the left side tail light and you guys can send me another replacement left side tail light that works correctly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Flores

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I recently installed these on my boat trailer, instead of paying some one to put in a new wiring harness and lights. Easy to install and very bright. Very happy with product. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Edwards Jr.

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: Lights worked great...using on utility trailer so don't really have too much exposure to submersion in water. For the money, seem to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon User1111

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: I have took my trailer on 4 trips with these lights installed and 2 of the trips were down bumpy back roads and they still work great and are very bright. If your switching over from the old style you'll have a extra wire (the white one) that's the ground wire I grounded it to one of the studs on the tail light
customer_reviews.author: chad kenley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! - Directions suck as in there were none.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and appears to be good fit and finish. There were however no directions and if it weren't for youtube.com this product still wouldn't be installed. Yes, there were only 3 wires but I would not have figured it out - next time include directions!
customer_reviews.author: Geo Von Finklestein

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This set of trailer lights replaced the originals on my trailer. These led units are much nicer and were an exact replacement as far as bolt holes are concerned. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Baze981

customer_reviews.title: Test these when you get them do not wait!!
customer_reviews.text: Ooops...took me a month to get the trailer built, went to test these today to install and the white license light does not illuminate. Unfortunately I am a week past the return window. $20 down the drain. Also as others have stated, the studs are very short and there is no way to open the light and install your own mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: jd75

customer_reviews.title: Cool look, great light color and very bright
customer_reviews.text: These have a really cool custom look, they match my other blacked out lights so the trailer is fully monochromatic
customer_reviews.author: Alise

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I'll update this review if I end up having water in them, but so far I've launched my SeaDoo trailer three times and they're still working great. The water sealing on these was much better on this than on any previous LED trailer lights I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Karry J.

customer_reviews.title: 12v waterproof square led trailer lights
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the price of the competitors these lights are worth every penny. They are everything they say they are and more. Very bright and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Issue
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint would be that the wiring came out of the back of the light enclosure and there was not any groove for the wiring to run to the edge of box. I guess they assume you had a hole in your mounting plate for the wires to pass through. They did provide a foam spacer that allowed the wires to compress the foam so the tail light could sort of fit flush against the mounting plate. Since this purchase I've looked at competitors products and they have the groove for the wires to run so you are not squishing them against the mounting plate.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Doty

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 5 months before one filled with water. After 3 months, some individual LEDs stopped working. I would definitely not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Napali

customer_reviews.title: No for Boat Trailers!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These leaked and some lights have gone out after only submerging 3 or 4 times. Does anyone know who's lights will work in Salt Water? I've tried a lot and nothing seems to be truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam E.

customer_reviews.title: Lights are NOT fully sealed and bulbs start to burn out after a year.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for a year, but they’re NOT sealed well. The passenger side light has water in it and it was never submerged in water. Somehow rain/moisture is able to get inside of this light. Currently, half the lights light up and the other flicker on and off. I would not recommend this product unless you put a water-proof case around it. Or I would suggest a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you need if you want to replace lights on a trailer and don't need any wiring or plugs. They are bright, mount to standard setups, and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are complete junk!! After only being on my boat trailer for 3 trips to the lake which is 10 minutes from my house the license plate light does not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for led lights. Decent quality lights l am happy with purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RLE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tail lights!
customer_reviews.text: I used to replace the tail lights on my Tractor Supply trailer. They are super bright and have not noticed any moisture getting inside them. I would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wired it up and now I have working trailer lights. Note: make sure your trailer is connected to your vehicle's hitch when testing to complete the ground circuit (if you don't have a dedicated ground wire running from harness to each light)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gniazdowski

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to install although I wish both sides had the white light rather than just the license plate side. It looks odd on my trailer because my license plate is on the center of my trailer rather than under the left side of the trailer where the brake light is.
customer_reviews.author: thampson

customer_reviews.title: You need these lights.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are 100% reliable when compared to the original bulb/socket original equipment. Beautifully bright. The only installation problem that I had was providing a solid ground on each side mount. I used a long threaded bolt and terminated the ground wire with a LUG.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdogbyte

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old trailer bulb lights.
customer_reviews.text: I had the original bulb lights on my motorcycle trailer which were continually burning out, either by water shorting the electric wiring or by being shaken/jarred on the road. These LED waterproof lights have worked perfectly, and they are brighter than the old bulb lights.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I replace the old style lights with these and they work great. No more fussing with the old 1157 twist in bulbs. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Dan Conrath

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on my utility trailer last week and the install was simple. The lights are bright and worked perfect. I can't say how well they'll do under water, but for standard lights they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Custom Gutter

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of lights for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of lights for the price. Would have been better if wire nuts were included though. These are sealed units so lenses are NOT replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these trailer lights to replace the broken ones on a Kendon motorcycle trailer. Easy install and they work great. All funtions work and their brightness make this a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Cole

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my boat trailer which has lights often submerged. The old incandescent lights routinely burned out due to being under water. These LEDs don't seem to have any trouble. Will buy more for next trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Charley

customer_reviews.title: Good light, it is water resistant out of the box but the silicone will fade over time
customer_reviews.text: These are good lights, especially for the money. I’m not loving the silicone that seals the wires on the back of the housing. I would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A 1/4" NF nut will start very easily..
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware the studs on the lamps are METRIC! Perhaps earlier versions had standard (1/4") studs, but the ones I received appear to require M6 nuts. A 1/4" NF nut will start very easily...but after about 2 turns...it binds. (A sure giveaway that the studs are metric.) I would ask that they update their description to note this, because this is very important and standard 1/4" nuts almost seem to work...but you will destroy the threads... They look promising, but I haven't installed them yet because of the "nut" issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina McNamee

customer_reviews.title: No more bulb issues
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the same size and shape as the bulb type lights they replaced. The mounting holes lined up perfectly. All that was left after that was splicing (I chose enviro splices) four wires (two per side). They work and look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Could not beat the price. Of equal quality in the stores would have run me close to $40, so at $16 I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Everything Worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised with no issues. Make sure its got a good ground and it will work great! Very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a nice product, easy to install and bright... Only time will tell if durable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Only can return to UPS Store. An App is the only way to return.
customer_reviews.text: No return address provided. I received the product damaged and I am trying to return it finding only an APP. Which I must visit a UPS store to return this item. I am not going into Stores during this Pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Wassmer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: very good product, one arrived damaged but the forwarding was very fast, they work very well, bright light
customer_reviews.author: Arian

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: They look fantastic, brighter than I expected and easy to install. I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Patterson

customer_reviews.title: After 9 months one failed
customer_reviews.text: After nine months of light use on boat trailer in salt water one light has failed completely and the other has water in it. They looked good initially but I would not buy again because the lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harper

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great price, could not be happier.
customer_reviews.text: These worked straight out of the box extremely well. Wish I needed another pair. :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Angen

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble starting out the wires are color-coded wrong from the factory but with help from outside people that know more about wiring that I do I got it taken care of they work great , I do like them works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Michael A  (Mike) Stark

customer_reviews.title: Easy and bright
customer_reviews.text: Lights are very easy to install. They're bright and work great on my stock trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Could use directions in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these. They look way better than the cheap set I bought at a Unclaimed Freight store. Have not installed them yet, but soon. One thing, there is no wiring directions, and the wiring colors are not the same as a typical trailer wiring harness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have incadesant  bulb based lights. Dont buy new bulbs buy these instead.
customer_reviews.text: They are so much brighter and way better quality build then the lights I had previously. The Power cable comes out the back so I had to drill a hole in trailer mount to feed the cables through.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER M.

product_meta.title: Partsam 12V Waterproof Square Led Trailer Light,Red LED Stop Turn Tail License Brake Running Light Lamp for Trailers Under 80" Boat Trailer Truck Marine Camper RV Snowmobile,IP68,DOT Compliant
feature_bullets: Application: Universal for Trucks, trailers under 80", tractors, semi-trailer, Dump Truck, bus, boat, special vehicle,etc

15 Diodes ( 12 Red+3 Red ) LED Combination stop turn tail side marker light w/reflector-Curb side; Passenger Side Serves 6 functions: Stop light, Turn signal light, Tail light, Rear reflex reflector, Side marker light, Side reflex reflector;

19 Diodes ( 12 Red+3 Red+4 White ) LED Combination stop turn tail side marker light w/reflector-Street side with license illuminator; Driver Side Serves 7 functions: Stop light, Turn signal light, Tail light, Rear reflex reflector, Side marker light, Side reflex reflector, License plate illuminator;

Add or upgrade the lights on boat, snowmobile, camper, or utility trailer; High visibility safety lights are EASY TO INSTALL and the wiring details are in the description part; completely sealed and waterproof, its acrylic len are engineered to block water out and ensure the circuits are protected. Super bright LED lights provide maximum visibility and safety. Fully operable in inclement weather, these heavy duty trailer lights are tough and durable for the long term

Package include: 1 Pairs Lights + 2 Gaskets + 4 Screws 【Tips】 PARTSam is the ONLY authorized seller of Partsam products.If you receive a product that does not arrive branded PARTSam on or not in a PARTSam packaging with logo, please contact that seller for a refund as it is a counterfeit PARTSam product.
